name: Go Ham!
description:
Go Ham! is an endless runner featuring a hamster in its hamster wheel. 

Credits: 

  • Ingvild Grotløkken - game concept, 3D modelling, texturing [Portfolio]
  • Andrea Fjørtoft Kjerstad - concept art, 2D art []
  • Bjørnar Børsheim - animation []
  • Emma Holm Pedersen - gameplay programming [LinkedIn]
  • Dexter André Osiander - menu programming [Portfolio]
